scripts.start: npm run start --prefix backend & npm run start --prefix frontend
scripts.watch: npm run watch --prefix backend & npm run start --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.test:e2e: npm run start --prefix backend & npm run test:e2e --prefix frontend
scripts.test:e2e:open: npm run start --prefix backend & npm run test:e2e:open --prefix frontend
